title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When using the SaveAs function, the file is saved with a generic file icon and without any file extension. When the file is opened, it is treated as a text file.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed. The file should retain the parent java file icon.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a java file in the application.
2. Use the 'SaveAs' function to save the file.
3. Check the file icon and the file extension of the saved file.
